venue.name: The Mother Church, The First Church of Christ, Scientist

item.description:
Along a half-mile stretch of Huntington Avenue stands a dense concentration of some of Boston's most venerable cultural institutions. Walk with us through this corridor to learn about the establishments dedicated to the fine arts, music, theater, education, religion, sports and much more. Meet in front of the First Church of Christ Scientist, facing Massachusetts Avenue. Nearest T-stop: Green Line, Symphony Station. Admission: $15.00.

All tours proceed rain or shine; reservations are not required. For more information please call Boston By Foot at 617-367-2345 or visit us at www.bostonbyfoot.org.
item.name: Avenue of the Arts: A Tour of Huntington Avenueâ€™s Cultural Gems
